alerts.name: SeafoodPipelineFailure
alerts.description: Alert when the seafood data processing pipeline fails

alerts.name: DataVolumeDrop
alerts.description: Alert when processed data volume drops below threshold

alerts.name: PriceAnomaly
alerts.description: Alert when price changes exceed normal range

alerts.name: ProcessingDelay
alerts.description: Alert when pipeline takes longer than expected

dashboards.name: SeafoodAnalysisDashboard
dashboards.description: Main dashboard for seafood analysis monitoring

queries.name: PipelinePerformance
queries.query: ADFPipelineRun | where PipelineName == 'SeafoodDataProcessingPipeline' | summarize avg(DurationInMs) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

queries.name: ErrorAnalysis
queries.query: ADFPipelineRun | where Status == 'Failed' | summarize count() by Error

queries.name: DataQuality
queries.query: CustomLog | where SourceSystem == 'SeafoodAnalysis' | summarize count() by QualityScore
